text.div:
VhDir Use Case Type

Codes for documenting business use case by a general grouping by business area.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/usecase

name: VhDirUseCaseType
title: VhDir Use Case Type
description: Codes for documenting business use case by a general grouping by business area.
